test run.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an occasion when you try doing something or using something before you really need to use it, to make sure everything works properly
test run.translation[1].definitions[0].d: an occasion when a new machine, piece of equipment, or procedure is tested to find out whether it works correctly
test run.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Fire during a test-run seriously damaged an experimental Japanese supertrain.
